q: sometimes blunt, sometimes crass, but always ever-knowledgeable Simon Cowell announced he was leaving the show at stars and more On the eve of his debut as American Marc Anthony judge, Steven Tyler says he's not the next Simon Cowell . it. During a recent stroll through the National Museum of George Washington History, Sen. Bernie Sanders discovered that a number of products sold in the gift shop were not made America, but produced in other countries. I find it especially disappointing that miniature sculptures of presidents George Washington that are sold in the museum, including George Washington , Thomas Jefferson , and Barack Obama were made in China, Sen. Page praised Eric Schmidt for an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, he said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role,'' he said

Cairo had raised fears that the country could suffer the same loss of cultural heritage as occurred in Iraq in 2003 after the fall of Saddam Hussein . Egypt's cultural treasures are now secure, Zahi Hawass said. The Valley of the Kings is safe, the pyramids are safe, 24 museums are safe, the synagogues and the monasteries and the Muslim monuments are completely safe, he said.

Louis Walsh is skeptical that Simon Cowell will really get married. In a December 2010 interview on`` The Graham Norton Show,'' Louis Walsh said why he does not think a Simon Cowell wedding will really happen: Simon Cowell is in love with himself; everybody knows that. He hasn't got time for anyone else.
